product_name: Showers Pass Club Pro Bike Jacket - Men's
long_description: The Showers Pass Club Pro bike jacket provides waterproof and breathable protection for weekend rides, commuting or training. So get out while others stay in. 2.5-layer nylon ripstop fabric features a waterproof, breathable laminate for durable, comfortable protection; fully taped seams prevent water from penetrating through seams. Durable water repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain showers and snow. Forward-positioned pit zippers and 2-way front waterproof zipper allow maximum ventilation control. Dropped rear flap provides extra protection in the riding position; cinch cord along waist seals in warmth. For added ventilation, oversize cuffs scoop air up your sleeves while open; cuffs feature rip-and-stick tabs to keep wind and rain out. Soft, moisture-wicking tricot lines interior chin guard and inner collar for enhanced comfort. Easily accessible waterproof twin front pockets keep contents dry. Mesh-lined large back panel vent for flow through ventilation; light loop allows you to attach a safety light. Showers Pass Club Pro jacket features an abundant amount of reflective taping to boost visibility to others. Collar features tabs to attach Showers Pass hood, sold separately.
short_description: The Showers Pass Club Pro bike jacket provides waterproof and breathable protection for weekend rides, commuting or training. So get out while others stay in.
